label: ConformityAttestation
comment: A conformity attestation issued by a competent body that defines one or more assessments (eg carbon intensity) about a product (eg batttery) against a specification (eg LCA method) defined in a standard or regulation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The accreditation that from a competent authority (ag NATA) that confirms the issuers authorised scope of assessments.
The list of specific assessments made within this conformity attestation.
The type of attestation (formal conformity, industry or communituy, self assessed)
A textual description of the scope or purpose of this confomrity attestation
The unique identifier of this conformity attestation
The party that issued the conformity attestation.
The party to whom the conformity attestation was issued.
The regulatory approval under which this conformity attestation is issued.
A list of relevant standards and/or regulations against which apply to this attestation (eg AS1163:2016).
The status of this conformity attestation (eg pending, valid, expired, revoked)
The type of criterion (optional or mandatory).
The date from which the conformity attestation is valid.
The date until which the conformity attestation is valid.
